original_text: Then the fourth angel made a sound with his trumpet. A third of the sun became dark. A third of the moon and a third of the stars also became dark. There was no light for a third of the day and there was no light for a third of the night.
korean_text: 넷째 천사가 나팔을 부니 해 삼분의 일과 달 삼분의 일과 별들의 삼분의 일이 타격을 받아 그 삼분의 일이 어두워지니 낮 삼분의 일은 비추임이 없고 밤도 그러하더라

sentences.original_text: Then the fourth angel made a sound with his trumpet.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 네 번째 천사가 나팔을 불었다.

sentences.original_text: A third of the sun became dark.
A third of the moon also became dark.
A third of the stars also became dark.
There was no light for a third of the day.
There was no light for a third of the night.
